title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Gran Canaria
description:
In this video we will look at multiple mods for Gran Canaria. We will start at Gran Canaria airport which received a huge update which makes the airport more realistic and includes both the military and public part. After we started our DC6 we set course to Las Palmas which is the capital of Gran Canaria. Both the city and harbor received a huge update which is really nice.

If you also want to give the scenery updates a try, below you will find the links to all of the updates used in this video.

Las Palmas: 
https://flightsim.to/file/6617/las-palmas-de-gran-canaria

Gran Canaria Airport: 
https://flightsim.to/file/7920/gclp-las-palmas-international-gran-canaria

Gran Canaria fixes: 
https://flightsim.to/file/10557/gran-canaria-rivers-and-trees-fixes
